resources.string:
Hello, world. 

This is a testing paragraph. 
My name is Jonathan and I am learning to code apps. 
This is my first time using the Kotlin language. 

I don't have anything to write here, 
it's merely to take up space for testing the scroll view. 
If you are reading this then that's strange, 
this text was not intended for anyone to read. 

This is the final paragraph. 
Yet more space being filled with meaningless text. 
I could have used lorem ipsum for this, I guess. 
Something inspired me to write this instead. 

Okay goodbye!
